channel.title: Reborn-x Oldschool || castle wars || bounty hunter || packed with content
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s0mp2s.png[/img]
Please note that this server will be undergoing constant updates.
Reborn-X is a Economy Server. Every skill must be trained and everyone of those are achievable. Although we are still focused on making combat good enough. you can compete against your friends to achieve 99 in skill levels, kill a variety of bosses and enjoy playing our minigames. Come and join Reborn - X now. [URL=http://"http://reborn-x.org"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://reborn-x.org/playv1.jar"]Play Now[/URL][/center]
[center][B]- Server Features -[/B] Bounty Hunter Castle Wars Old school themed Economy Good combat system Duel arena and staking Every skill functional Plenty of bosses Good Pking Working Clan chats Point systems
[/center]
[center][B]- Server Media -[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sRc4drj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/45ZlFAG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wNkljkt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5eJ7t3w.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WY9fkkK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4doMkAY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/f4vNEug.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FlAYhgq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wbIrjc6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VnyyJ10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N9A4vaV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Iif2j98.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4rLThCC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9GMghpA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/I31a2jc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tNsUbfk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/E3IiVc1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2urfyrB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Lpb7d0L.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E5F5DzL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pyeQbux.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/A7HHY7H.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pxTcHrF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qVpTore.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/914Tkto.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AoWwV9S.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hbJ3cjC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RQc9Rtw.png[/img] [/center]

item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

[center]

Please note that this server will be undergoing constant updates.

Reborn-X is a Economy Server. Every skill must be trained and everyone of those are achievable. Although we are still focused on making combat good enough. you can compete against your friends to achieve 99 in skill levels, kill a variety of bosses and enjoy playing our minigames. Come and join Reborn - X now.
[URL=http://“http://reborn-x.org”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://reborn-x.org/playv1.jar”]Play Now[/URL][/center]

[center][B]- Server Features -[/B]
